animeTitle: Eikou e no Spur: Igaya Chiharu Monogatari
animeDescription: A biography of Chiharu Igaya, who won a silver medal in men's slalom in Cortina d'Ampezzo Olympics in 1956, and became the first Japanese Winter Olympics medalist.  (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Okuwaki Masaharu', ['Director']], ['Watanabe Toshiyuki', ['Music']], ['Nakamura Mitsuki', ['Art Director']], ['Wada Noboru', ['Original Creator']]]
